perturbation.changed_text:
13.
SECURITY DEPOSIT
 
The Company shall provide a Security Deposit to the Repairer.
perturbation.explanation: This omission removes the specifics of how the security deposit is calculated and the actual amounts. This is referenced in Clause 17 (Conditions Precedent) and Exhibit 14 (Price Conditions). Clause 17 now references a security deposit that lacks clarity, creating an internal contradiction because the criteria for meeting the condition precedent are undefined. Furthermore, it creates issues with enforcement.
